name: Traffic Cop (itch)
description:
Check our game on youtube:

- description:

traffic cop is a fast and easy playing mobile game in which the player tries to controll traffic at a junction.

various items such as a teleport or slow motion are helping the player to achieve this goal

- made by:

  • Armin Weiß
  • Christoph Moser
  • Josef Wilhelm
  • Constantin Zach
  • Leonardo Bilic

with help from:

  • Oskar Fischer
  • Jakob Leitner
  • Johannes Sukal
  • Valentin Frantsits

- technologies used

Unity, Gimp, bfxr.net, paint.net, FamiTracker, Audacity
